title: If some follows us in a sin, would we get accredited with our sin & theirs? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Jasmine says we know that it is we know that if someone follows us in good deeds we will get the reward same as him but is it the same vice versa for example if someone sees you do something bad and copies that etc do you get the sin for yourself and from them as well the answer is definitely yes without any doubt if you do something harm and people follow you you will be accredited with their sins without it being omitted from their own
